meanings: (녹말가루로 만든 국수) cellophane (yam) noodles, glass noodles

vlive.english: Glass noodles... What are they made of?

examples.korean: Let’s get on with the matter in hand. 발음듣기 지금 당면한 일부터 진행을 하자. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let’s get on with the matter in hand. 발음

examples.korean: The problems facing the President are enormous. 발음듣기 대통령이 당면한 문제들은 막대하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The problems facing the President are enormous. 발음

examples.korean: I had no appreciation of the problems they faced. 발음듣기 나는 그들이 당면한 문제들에 공감하지 못했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I had no appreciation of the problems they faced. 발음

examples.korean: Our immediate concern is to help the families of those who died. 발음듣기 우리의 당면 관심사는 사망자 가족들을 돕는 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Our immediate concern is to help the families of those who died. 발음

examples.korean: Let me demonstrate to you some of the difficulties we are facing. 발음듣기 우리가 당면하고 있는 어려움들 중 일부를 실례를 들어 보여드리겠습니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Let me demonstrate to you some of the difficulties we are facing. 발음
